Text: thank you very much, the quality is awsome (y)

The BEST quality version of The Promise Part 2 I've seen. There are other scans floating around that are crooked and blurry, ignore those, because this torrent is pretty much perfect. You'll need a .cbr viewer like "Comicrack" if you want to see these ones, though, but that's to be expected with high quality scans.
Oh yay, thanks! The other one was so blurry.
